CustomField.formula:
/* Determine if we are in an internal stakeholder record based on the presence of a User object. Set the full name of the stakeholder in this field. This is used in lookup lists to show the full name of the person.*/
IF(RecordType.Name == "External Stakeholder", aecm__First_Name__c + " " + aecm__Last_Name__c , aecm__First_Name_Internal__c + " " + aecm__Last_Name_Internal__c )
CustomField.label: Stakeholder Name
